sentences.english: The siren wailed piercingly in the cold morning air.
sentences.chinese: 警報器在早晨的冷空氣裏尖厲地呼嘯著。

sentences.english: Often you hear high-pitched cries of the gulls as they search for food.
sentences.chinese: 你常常可以聽到正在捕食的海鷗發出尖厲的叫聲。

sentences.english: A sharp cry of surprise disturbed the tranquility of the night.
sentences.chinese: 尖厲的驚叫聲打破了夜晚的寧靜。

sentences.english: The shrill voice of the police vehicle was behind them, he bethought of hijacking the hostage.
sentences.chinese: 身後的警車發出尖厲的叫聲，傑克遜想到了劫持人質。

sentences.english: All of a sudden , a shrill voice broke forth out of the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 突然地，黑暗中爆發出一個尖厲的聲音。
樹木在霜凍下發出尖厲的響聲。

sentences.english: A scream for help came from inside the building.
sentences.chinese: 從那棟建築物內傳出一聲尖厲的呼救。
